name: Lendflow
headline: Embedded lending infrastructure for software companies
description: We help companies embed lending services into their software so they can better serve their customers by helping them access capital, increase engagement in their product, improve retention and expand their revenue per user.

founders.name: Jon Fry, Founder
founders.description: Founded ChannelGrowth in 2014, we specialized in small business customer acquisition for the alternative lending industry. We originated $150+ million over the past 5 years. Launched Quicklinecredit in 2017, which was our own integral micro funding product, where we built software for each stage of the lending process. Launched Lendflow in 2019.

founders.name: Matthew Watts, Founder
founders.description: Matthew is co-founder of Lendflow and plays a leading role in driving key strategic initiatives and innovation across all engineering teams and the core business. Prior to joining Lendflow, Matthew oversaw teams at SpendHQ and directly leverages this expertise at Lendflow. In his free time he works as a volunteer for the National Park Service.

# Where embedded credit products are built
From application to decisioning and underwriting - Lendflow provides the tools you need to build and embed credit products.
[See a Demo](https://lendflow.com/</contact-us>)
![control panel](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/623e0a18ef5bb24ac0047cdd_Embedded%20Credit%20Operating%20System%20-%20Home%20page.png)
Leading fintechs, lenders and vertical SaaS companies use Lendflow to launch embedded credit products.
![a to b logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/610c551d558b6f74cb6be208_atob.svg)
![Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/623dfca8001ce62a3940b178_Balance%20logo.png)

![a to b logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60fec16c70ee4534fdaf549f_atob-logo.png)
AtoB
"Lendflow provides us with the underwriting infrastructure that has allowed us to get to market quickly and scale up our fleet card operation at a 100% month-over-month pace. Their single API connection into multiple services, flexible pay-as-go pricing, and quick feature turnaround time makes their platform stand out from the rest."
![profile picture](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60fec2bc85e2102ee8d31945_vignan-linkedin%201.png)
##### Vignan Vilivela
CEO and co-founder at AtoB
![Shape](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60f88b5d38ea9e32bb6d96ae_testimonial-shape-1.png)
![levelset logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60fec18496f45718d8944e43_levelset-logo.png)
Levelset
"From providing easy access to capital to our customers to providing the building blocks for our own credit product offering, Lendflow has been there every step of the way. Their flexible go-to-market solutions allowed us to bypass months of development time and countless hours of resources."
![profile picture](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60fec2c885e210298dd319a2_andrew-linkedin%201.png)

VP of Financial Products at Levelset

![placeholder logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60f88422dca7562f4f93ebbd_testimonial-company-logo.png)
Acme Co
We are a technology company building financing infrastructure for software and platform providers and their SMB customers. Businesses of all shapes and sizes can now access the credit products they need to grow and flourish - all from within the software or services they already use to manage their business.

## Introducing the most powerful embedded credit platform
Lendflow’s embedded credit ecosystem gives companies everything they need to build, embed and launch credit products.
[Start Now](https://lendflow.com/<https:/app.lendflow.com/register>)[SCHEDULE DEMO](https://lendflow.com/</contact-us>)
![admin panel](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/623e0a18ef5bb23726047ce0_Home%20page%20-%20hero%20\(1\).png)
## Embedded Credit Operating System
### Your command center for embeddable credit
From application to decisioning and underwriting - Lendflow provides the tools you need to build, embed and deliver superior credit products.
[LEARN MORE](https://lendflow.com/</embedded-credit-operating-system>)
## Credit Decisioning engine
### Smarter lending starts with better decisioning
Customize your own decisioning workflows to aggregate and analyze the most critical data points on SMB applicants in the order that meets your specific underwriting requirements.
[LEARN MORE](https://lendflow.com/</credit-decisioning>)
![credit decision graphics](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/623e0a18ef5bb2ccd2047cd7_Credit%20Decisoning%20Engine%20-%20Home%20page.png)
![Lender marketplace graphic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/6659ddb0c3c5fb9b70e446e5_Group%2016%20\(1\).png)
## Lender marketplace
### Specialized lenders, faster access to capital
Match qualified SMBs with specialized lenders that are best positioned to understand and meet specific industry needs.
[LEARN MORE](https://lendflow.com/</lender-marketplace>)
![Shape](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60e7289f994248f0620ddf14_green-section-top-shape.svg)
![Shape](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60e7289f99424881560ddf16_green-section-shape-1.svg)![Shape](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60e7289f99424864410ddf17_green-section-shape-2.svg)![Shape](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60e7289f994248ff130ddf03_footer-blob-1.svg)![Shape](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60e7289f99424840720ddf04_footer-blob-2.svg)
Built for developers
## Open-ended possibilities, lightning fast launch
With our developer-friendly open API and comprehensive decisioning tools, you can build or embed credit products directly into your UI/UX and get to market _that_ much faster.
![javascript function](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/623e0a18ef5bb25660047cdb_For%20Developers%20-%20home%20page.png)![code example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60f9932ff7b54a0905aaeaad_new-third-section-image.png)
### Embeddable components
Integrate our pre-built application widgets in under five minutes.
### Extensive API
Create a deeply immersive and seamless experience within your core product.
### Webhooks
Get advanced, real-time notifications of offers and terms.
### Security
Breathe easy knowing data security and protection is at the core of what we do.
[Read the docs](https://lendflow.com/<https:/api.lendflow.com/docs>)[Quickstart guide](https://lendflow.com/</quickstart-guide>)
![Shape](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60f84b097192e0ea8ff62261_top-curve-footer-banner.png)
## Launch and scale faster
See how Lendflow can help you build, embed or enhance your credit products so you can acquire more customers, increase revenue and accelerate growth.
![Shape](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60e7289f994248612b0ddecf/60e7289f99424871c20ddefe_CTA-DesignShape.svg)

# Where embedded credit products are built
From application to decisioning and underwriting - Lendflow provides the tools you need to build and embed credit products.
See a Demo⟨16⟩
![control panel⟨26⟩]
Leading fintechs, lenders and vertical SaaS companies use Lendflow to launch embedded credit products.
![a to b logo⟨27⟩]
![Logo⟨28⟩]
![Logo⟨29⟩]
![Logo⟨30⟩]
![Logo⟨31⟩]
![levelset logo⟨32⟩]
![lmn logo⟨33⟩]
![Logo⟨34⟩].png)
![a to b logo⟨35⟩]
AtoB
"Lendflow provides us with the underwriting infrastructure that has allowed us to get to market quickly and scale up our fleet card operation at a 100% month-over-month pace. Their single API connection into multiple services, flexible pay-as-go pricing, and quick feature turnaround time makes their platform stand out from the rest."
![profile picture⟨36⟩]
##### Vignan Vilivela
CEO and co-founder at AtoB
![Shape⟨37⟩]
![levelset logo⟨38⟩]
Levelset
"From providing easy access to capital to our customers to providing the building blocks for our own credit product offering, Lendflow has been there every step of the way. Their flexible go-to-market solutions allowed us to bypass months of development time and countless hours of resources."
![profile picture⟨39⟩]
##### Andrew Dunn
VP of Financial Products at Levelset

## Introducing the most powerful embedded credit platform
Lendflow’s embedded credit ecosystem gives companies everything they need to build, embed and launch credit products.
Start Now⟨43⟩SCHEDULE DEMO⟨16⟩
![admin panel⟨44⟩].png)
## Embedded Credit Operating System
### Your command center for embeddable credit
From application to decisioning and underwriting - Lendflow provides the tools you need to build, embed and deliver superior credit products.
LEARN MORE⟨45⟩
## Credit Decisioning engine
### Smarter lending starts with better decisioning
Customize your own decisioning workflows to aggregate and analyze the most critical data points on SMB applicants in the order that meets your specific underwriting requirements.
LEARN MORE⟨46⟩
![credit decision graphics⟨47⟩]
![Lender marketplace graphic⟨48⟩].png)
## Lender marketplace
### Specialized lenders, faster access to capital
Match qualified SMBs with specialized lenders that are best positioned to understand and meet specific industry needs.
LEARN MORE⟨49⟩
![Shape⟨50⟩]
![Shape⟨51⟩]![Shape⟨52⟩]![Shape⟨53⟩]![Shape⟨54⟩]
Built for developers
## Open-ended possibilities, lightning fast launch
With our developer-friendly open API and comprehensive decisioning tools, you can build or embed credit products directly into your UI/UX and get to market _that_ much faster.
![javascript function⟨55⟩]![code example⟨56⟩]
### Embeddable components
Integrate our pre-built application widgets in under five minutes.
### Extensive API
Create a deeply immersive and seamless experience within your core product.
### Webhooks
Get advanced, real-time notifications of offers and terms.
### Security
Breathe easy knowing data security and protection is at the core of what we do.
Read the docs⟨57⟩Quickstart guide⟨58⟩
![Shape⟨59⟩]
## Launch and scale faster
See how Lendflow can help you build, embed or enhance your credit products so you can acquire more customers, increase revenue and accelerate growth.
![Shape⟨60⟩]
See a demo![icon⟨61⟩](https://lendflow.com/</contact-us>)

generated_description:
Lendflow is an Austin-based fintech company that specializes in providing embedded lending infrastructure tailored for software companies. Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, Lendflow aims to empower businesses by embedding lending services directly into their software solutions. This enables companies to enhance customer engagement, increase retention rates, and ultimately expand their revenue streams by making capital more accessible to users.

With a team of about 55 employees, Lendflow is led by Dalton Caldwell as a Group Partner, positioning them as a significant player in the lending space. Their offerings include a **Credit Decisioning Engine**, an **Embedded Credit Operating System**, and a **Lender Marketplace**, which collectively streamline the lending process from application to underwriting.

What sets Lendflow apart is their commitment to developer-friendly solutions. They offer an open API, allowing companies to seamlessly integrate lending functionalities into their products with speed and ease. This approach not only increases time to market but ensures that businesses can quickly respond to the evolving needs of their customers.

In their relatively short history, Lendflow has proven to be a valuable partner for various fintechs and SaaS companies looking to diversify their offerings and drive customer growth. Their mission to simplify the lending landscape helps small to medium-sized businesses access the financial tools they need to thrive within the platforms they already use.

For anyone interested in deeper integration of credit solutions within their software, Lendflow stands ready as a robust ally. You can explore more about them on their website: [Lendflow](https://lendflow.com).
